title: BRIEF-Euro Sun Mining - Increases Ownership Of Vilhelmina Minerals
text:
BRIEF-Euro Sun Mining - Increases Ownership Of Vilhelmina Minerals

Stock Markets 1 hour ago (Sep 25, 2019 20:10)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Euro Sun Mining - Increases Ownership Of Vilhelmina Minerals Sept 25 (Reuters) - Euro Sun Mining Inc : * EURO SUN INCREASES OWNERSHIP OF VILHELMINA MINERALS INC * TO ISSUE 3.698569 SHARES OF EXCHANGE FOR EACH VILHELMINA SHARE HELD BY VILHELMINA SHAREHOLDER FOR PURCHASE PRICE OF 9.1 MILLION ESM SHARES * VILHELMINA MINERALS IS CURRENTLY RE-PERMITTING PAST PRODUCING STEKENJOKK COPPER MINE IN SWEDEN AND JOMA GRUVER COPPER MINE

BRIEF-Euro Sun Mining - Increases Ownership Of Vilhelmina Minerals
